allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Update trial period to 30 days and fix navigation issues - Build 16

- Change trial period from 14 to 30 days in schema and sign-up flow
- Fix auth header appearing on authentication screens
- Re-enable full IAP functionality with proper error handling
- Update build number to 16
- Configure EAS secrets for Supabase credentials

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add onboarding layout to fix route warning

- Create app/onboarding/_layout.tsx to match folder structure
- Fixes "no route named 'onboarding' exists" warning
- Makes routing structure consistent with auth and subscription

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git add app/auth/sign-in.tsx app/auth/sign-up.tsx app/onboarding/index.tsx app/subscription/paywall.tsx)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Add MileMate wordmark branding to key screens

- Add wordmark to sign-in and sign-up pages
- Add wordmark to onboarding welcome screen
- Add wordmark to paywall screen
- Ensures consistent branding throughout the app

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
Bash(git add assets/Wordmark.png assets/images/wordmark.png app/auth/sign-in.tsx app/auth/sign-up.tsx app/onboarding/index.tsx app/subscription/paywall.tsx)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix wordmark path to use assets/images/wordmark.png

- Move wordmark from assets/Wordmark.png to assets/images/wordmark.png
- Update all imports to use correct path
- Fixes import errors in sign-in, sign-up, onboarding, and paywall

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix sign-up flow to handle email confirmation

- Check if session exists after sign-up
- If session exists, user is auto-signed in (no email confirmation)
- If no session, prompt user to check email for confirmation link
- Fixes issue where users were stuck on sign-up page after registration

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Switch to Apple IAP-only trial system (no database trial)

Database Changes:
- Remove automatic 30-day trial from profiles table
- Trial dates now optional (managed by Apple)
- Default subscription_status is ''none'' instead of ''trial''
- Added ''none'' as valid subscription status

Sign-Up Flow:
- Remove "Start your 30-day free trial" messaging
- Change to "Get started with MileMate"
- Button text changed from "Start Free Trial" to "Create Account"
- Remove trial info section

Subscription Logic:
- shouldShowPaywall() now only checks Apple IAP status
- No more database trial expiration checks
- Users must subscribe through Apple to access app
- Apple handles all trial logic and fraud prevention

Paywall Updates:
- Change header from "Trial Ending" to "Choose Your Plan"
- Subtitle: "Start with a 30-day free trial"
- Remove trial days remaining logic
- Emphasize Apple free trial option

Benefits:
- Apple prevents fake email abuse
- No email confirmation needed
- Industry-standard approach
- Better fraud protection
- Simpler codebase

 Generated with [Claude Code](https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
